title: China probes Meta’s $2 billion AI deal amid reports that its highest-paid employee Alexandr Wang finds Zuckerberg’s micromanagement ‘suffocating’
description: Zuckerberg vs. Wang amid China probes Meta: China is investigating Meta's acquisition of AI startup Manus. This probe examines potential violations of laws concerning overseas technology transfers. The investigation adds to challenges for Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg. He is investing heavily in artificial intelligence. Internal leadership issues are also surfacing. Alexandr Wang, a key AI hire, reportedly finds Zuckerberg's control stifling.

title: Key researchers return to OpenAI from former CTO Mira Murati's Thinking Labs
description: Barret Zoph, Luke Metz, and Sam Schoenholz have officially rejoined the company, following a brief stint at former OpenAI CTO Mira Murati's artificial intelligence (AI) startup. The return of the trio is good news for the Sam Altman-led company, which was hit by multiple departures last year amid an intensifying war for talent in the AI space.

title: Elon Musk’s AI chatbot Grok banned from generating sexualised images
description: Tech News News: Grok the AI chatbot of Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence firm xAI will no longer be able to generate sexualised or revealing images of real people. .
content: In response to mounting backlash and regulatory scrutiny, Grok AI has ceased the creation of explicit images of real individuals. xAI has introduced stringent technical measures to curb misuse, particularly addressing concerns around deepfake content... [4843 chars]

title: China drafting purchase rules for Nvidia H200 chips, Nikkei Asia reports
description: China is working to set rules on how many advanced artificial intelligence chip companies can buy from foreign makers such as Nvidia , Nikkei Asia reported on Thursday, citing two people familiar with the matter.
content:
The Chinese central government is working on rules that will likely regulate the total volume of cutting-edge AI chips local companies can purchase, effectively allowing some sales by Nvidia instead of banning them outright, the report added.

title: How a Techno-Optimist Became a Grave Skeptic
description: Understand how artificial intelligence (AI) fits into the narrative of technological optimism and societal adaptation over time.

title: Robinhood CEO Vlad Tenev says AI will create new jobs, not eliminate work
description: Robinhood CEO Vlad Tenev argues AI won't eliminate jobs but will redefine work, predicting new job families as artificial intelligence reshapes the economy.
content:
As fears grow that artificial intelligence (AI) will wipe out jobs, Robinhood CEO Vlad Tenev says the opposite may be true.
Tenev argues that AI won’t eliminate work, but rather redefine what it means to have a job.
